title: Konna Joushi ni Okomari deshitara
original_name: こんな上司にお困りでしたら
sinopse:
The only one who knows the secret about my boss, an overly talented sadist by the name of Saeki-san...is me. But why is this successful, hardworking boss of mine so perverted?!

(Source: Media Do International/Akita Publishing)
